articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Village Newly Built as Socialist Fairyland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Village Newly Built as Socialist Fairyland
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, again visited far-flung Paekhak-dong in Sonbong District of Rason City, a village newly built as a fairyland of miracle, by traveling by air, car and ship to provide beloved people with a cradle of happiness on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 He shook hands with commanding officers and officials one by one, praising them for having done a lot of work to carry out the order to round off the rehabilitation of the flood-hit Rason City before the party founding anniversary. "I have come here as I had thought I would feel relieved only when I looked round the newly built dwelling houses before any others," he said, adding he was pleased to travel to that place.
					
					 Going round dwelling houses, he learned in detail about construction and preparations for letting inhabitants move to new houses.
					
					 Asking officials whether the newly built houses are better than old ones, their floor-heating system is good and water is running well, he was greatly satisfied to see all the dwelling houses built in such a way as to enable the settlers to fully enjoy a happy and highly civilized life.
					
					 Noting the longer he watches the village newly built by service personnel of the People's Army at Paekhak-dong, the more fantastic it looks, he said with great satisfaction that color of the roofs and outer walls of the dwelling houses looks nice, roads, retaining walls and drainage ways have been built well, they have even vegetable gardens and firewood is supplied to them. "It has become a tradition to do so," he added.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the picturesque dwelling houses of Paekhak-dong with a broad smile, he said they look so spectacular and he felt happy and proud to watch them.
					
					 "As I have always stressed, there is nothing more important than doing things for the people", he noted.
					
					 Being very pleased to see another fairyland built in more 30 odd days, he said this is a miracle of turning misfortune into a blessing that can be created only by service personnel of the People's Army which is faithful to the Party and ardently loves the people and he felt highly proud of being the supreme commander of the People's Army, the defender of the country, creator of people's happiness and vanguard for implementing Party's policies.
					
					 Highly praising the soldier-builders for helping the people cherish deep trust in the Party and protecting the prestige of the Party by devotedly carrying out the order given by it, he thanked all the units involved in the construction in the name of the WPK.
					
					 Noting that he felt his heart swell with pride when thinking about the feats performed by service personnel of the People's Army in all parts of Rason and felt the strong urge to boast of them before the world, he said he was reluctant to leave without having a photo session with them. So, he waited for an hour and thirty minutes till tens of thousands of service personnel have gathered for the event.
					
					 He had a photo session with soldier-builders with newly built dwelling houses as a background.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Yang Gon, O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won, Kim Yo Jong and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Major Party and State Leadership Organizations
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Major Party and State Leadership Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet sent a congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un in their joint name on Wednesday.
					 The message said the history of the WPK is a history of great revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and that of the great revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the founder of the glorious WPK, peerless statesman and outstanding leader of the 20th century who developed the WPK into a great guide of the revolutionary cause of Juche and led it to demonstrate its dignity as the prestigious revolutionary party leading the cause of human independence, the socialist cause, the message said, and went on:
					
					 The feats the President performed by founding the Juche-type revolutionary party with his outstanding idea and unusual practice and leading the general staff of the revolution with his experienced and tested leadership to glorify the history of modern Korea with the most shining victory and glory will always go down in the history of the country and the struggle of the popular masses for independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal general secretary of the WPK who developed it into the great party of the President and the powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution and wisely led it along the road of victory, thus laying an eternal foundation for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who formulated the Juche idea fathered by the President as the unique idea guiding the party and the revolution by linking it with the august name of the President, proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism and wisely led the historic cause of materializing it.
					
					 By carrying forward the President's idea of attaching importance to arms, Kim Jong Il made ceaseless journeys for leadership over the army and developed the People's Army into the army of the leader and the party. He also formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and embodied it in all fields of the party and the state activities. This is the outstanding feat performed by him for the cause of our party, the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Un is a great leader steering with confidence the WPK as the powerful political organization guiding the Juche revolution, true to the idea and cause of the great leaders, the message stressed:
					
					 Regarding the instructions of the great leaders as the immutable creed, you have carried out their instructions without an inch of deviation and without a single concession to lead the revolutionary struggle and the construction with your outstanding caliber and experienced and tested leadership. As led by you, the WPK is growing stronger to be the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with each passing day.
					
					 The heroic advance of the WPK and the army and people of the DPRK will always emerge victorious as they are advancing, with you at the top post of our party and revolution, flying the immortal flags bearing portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. Only eternal prosperity and glory are in store for us.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Haeju City
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Haeju City
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected in Haeju City, South Hwanghae Province.
					An unveiling ceremony of the statues took place with splendor on Wednesday.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae, and officials concerned, labor innovators, shock brigade members, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), working people, youth and students in the province.
					
					Senior party, state and army officials and leading officials of the province unveiled the statues.
					
					A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was placed before the statues.
					
					Laid there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet and a floral basket in the name of the people in the province.
					
					Also placed there were floral baskets in the name of party and power bodies, working people's organizations, institutions and industrial establishments, farms, universities in the province and KPA and KPISF units.
					
					The participants made bows to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before the statues in humble reverence. 
					
					Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made an address. 
					
					He said that the erection of the statues of the great leaders in Haeju City is a special event of great significance in glorifying forever their revolutionary careers and exploits and a great honor and happiness of the people in the province.
					
					Every place of the province is associated with outstanding and tested leadership of the great leaders and their warm love for the people, he noted, adding:
					
					Kim Jong Un showed such profound loving care as making sure that their statues were erected in Haeju City on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					Being briefed on the statues, the participants looked round them.

articles.title: Greetings to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of its independence, national holiday of the Ugandan people.
					 Kim in the message said he is pleased with the fact that the Ugandan people have made great advance in their efforts to consolidate the political stability and peace of the country and achieve the sustained progress of the national economy under the correct leadership of the Ugandan president.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the Ugandan president success in his responsible work and the Ugandan people fresh development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kyongwon Economic Development Zone to Be Set Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Kyongwon Economic Development Zone to Be Set Up in DPRK

					 The sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised over the zone.
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly was promulgated on Oct. 8.

Ltd., of China, and his party and a delegation of the Shengzhou Zhongqiao Mining Industry Co. Ltd., of Zhejiang Province, China head by Deputy General Manager Cui Yingjun.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in China Here

articles.title: Delegation of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation led by Co-Chairman Johnny Hon, arrived here on Oct. 8 to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the first meeting of the council.

articles.title: Delegation, Delegate of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegation, Delegate of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A Delegation and delegate of organizations for the study of the Juche idea arrived here on Thursday to participate in celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included a delegation of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea led by General Secretary Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu and Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Arrive
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests arrived here on Thursday to take part in celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a Russian friendly delegation headed by the director of the Russian Center Fund for the Study and Consultation of Politics, a delegation of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association led by Thomas Lichter, vice-chairman of the association and chairman of the preparatory committee of the association for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK, a delegation of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association led by Igor Jurisic, chairman of the association and chairman of the Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of WPK's birthday and Korean liberation, a delegation of the France-Korea Friendship Association, a delegation of the Ireland-Korea Friendship Association led by Irina Malenko, a friendship visiting group of the Singapore-DPRK Exchange Association headed by Chairperson See Kok Heng and Raymond Ferguson, co-secretary general of the Asia-Pacific Regional preparatory committee for 
					
					 celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK and national secretary general of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Korean Friendship Association
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Korean Friendship Association
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Chairman of the association Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Spanish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the WPK's birthday and Korea's liberation, on a visit to the DPRK conveyed the gift to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Ensemble
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Ensemble
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Victor Yeliseev, chief of the ensemble, conveyed the gift to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Participants in International Meeting
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Participants in International Meeting
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the first enlarged meeting of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation on Thursday.
					 The letter said that the first enlarged meeting since the establishment of the Foundation was a significant meeting that made sure that the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to the cause of global independence shine forever and work of the foundation develops in a worldwide scale.
					
					 It noted that the participants are further convinced of the final victory of the great Korean people, witnessing the brilliant development made by the DPRK where the lifetime desires of the President and the Chairman are blooming into a brilliant reality under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We will devote ourselves to the work of expanding the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation as a foundation of the whole mankind. So we will make sure that the beaming images of the President and the Chairman would be cherished in the hearts of the progressives around the world.
					
					 The President and the Chairman will always be in the hearts of the world people and the history of the great sun will be given a steady continuity thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is possessed of the noble loyalty for the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and gift by Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The floral basket and gift were conveyed to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Johnny Hon on Thursday.
					
					 That day Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Bao-zhong who is a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, a delegation of the Japanese Society for Consultation on Korean Affairs and Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Spanish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the WPK and Korea's liberation and chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain. They are on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The floral baskets were separately handed to officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok, and family members of persons related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues on Mansu Hill on Thursday.
					 Among them were family members of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, family members of Zhou Wei, the daughter of Zhou Baozhong, family members of Jiang Zihua, Jie Qing, Liu Tongshi, Wang Minggui, Liu Hanxing, Peng Xilu, Chai Shiying who are Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family members of Pak Kil Song, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, family members of So Sun Ok, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China and family members of Kim Sun Ok, Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 They paid high respect to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues in boundless reverence.
					
					 The guests entered the halls where great leaders lie in state and bowed to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, bereaved family member of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, and foreign guests here Thursday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday. Among the foreign guests were the participants in the first enlarged meeting of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior and members of the missions of the UNDP, WFP and the UN FAO here. 
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Monument to Party Founding
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Monument to Party Founding
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and its members visited the Monument to Party Founding on Thursday with the approach of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 They went round the monument, being briefed on it. 
					
					 Jo Il Min said the monument is the historical one demonstrating the greatness and invincibility of the WPK. 
					
					 The visit to the monument offered an opportunity to deeply grasp the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il performed in the history of building the revolutionary party of Juche with their unique ideology and theory and outstanding and tested leadership, he said, adding:
					
					 The WPK will always win victory as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition House here on Thursday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The exhibition on the theme of "Sea of flowers for best wishes to great mother party" is the grand political festival which clearly demonstrates the steadfast faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to hold in high esteem forever President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of Juche and reflects boundless reverence of progressive mankind.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition are tender-hearted image of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there are more than 21,000 potted flowers of the sun presented by many units including armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, diplomatic and international organizations here and organizations for friendship and solidarity. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of the festival organizing committee and the army and society who presented flowers to the exhibition, members of the societies for disseminating and supporting Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia, delegations of overseas compatriots and overseas Koreans and foreign guests. 
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony the participants looked round the exhibition house. -0-

articles.title: Youth and Students' Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Youth and Students' Dancing Parties Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Youth and students held dancing parties in different parts of the country on Thursday, 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The dancing parties started to the tune of "It Is October" which reflected the joy in October. They took place at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other places of the city. 
					
					 They presented dances, looking back upon the proud history of the WPK in which it has developed into the guiding force of the invincible party and the guiding force of the Songun revolution shining with the august name of the leader as it is holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the top post of our party.
					
					 The festive atmosphere picked up when songs including "Dash toward Future", "Our Future Is Bright" and other songs resounded forth to  reflect the revolutionary stamina and optimism of the young people who are bringing earlier the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation, tightly  holding the torch of the revolution handed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in every provincial capital, city and county seat on the same day.

articles.title: Ceremony of Conveying "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" Conferred upon Kim Jong Un Held
articles.content:
Ceremony of Conveying "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" Conferred upon Kim Jong Un Held
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of conveying "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" which was conferred upon supreme leader Kim Jong Un by the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					Present there were Teguh Santosa, secretary general of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					Teguh Santosa conveyed "THE STAR OF SOEKARNO" to Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Adherents to Juche Idea Honored
articles.content:
Adherents to Juche Idea Honored
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Adherents to the Juche idea were awarded the DPRK doctor's and master's degrees in socio-political science.
					 An awarding ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was awarded doctor's degree of socio-political science and Vadim Kudimin, editor-in-chief of the magazine Banner of Songun of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, master's degree of socio-political science in recognition of their ardent adherence and deep study and dissemination of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.

articles.title: Russian Ensemble Gives Its Premiere in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Russian Ensemble Gives Its Premiere in Pyongyang 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea gave its premiere at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Thursday. 
					 Among the audience were Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Myong Guk, officials concerned, creators and artistes of art troupes, teachers and students in the art education field and Pyongyangites. 
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials, diplomatic envoys and representatives of the international bodies here also enjoyed the performance. 
					
					 Put on the stage of the two parts performance were songs and dances representing ardent patriotism of the Russian people and songs and national flavor.
					
					 In chorus "Just War" and male solo and chorus "Song of Driver on the Front" the artistes depicted well the heroic mettle and fighting spirit of the service personnel and people who bravely turned out to protect the motherland from the fascists' aggression during the Great Patriotic War. 
					
					 The immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" presented by them were warmly acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 They staged mixed trio and chorus "Katsusha", male solos and choruses "Waves of Amur River" and "Kalinka" and other numbers, delighting the audience. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: First Game between DPRK and Philippine Teams Held
articles.content:
First Game between DPRK and Philippine Teams Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK and Philippine teams had the first game in the second stage of the preliminaries of the Asian region of the 2018 FIFA World Cup.
					 The game was held at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Thursday.
					
					 The second stage games started from June 11.
					
					 Teams of 40 countries and regions play league matches, divided into 8 groups. After its games with Yemen, Uzbekistan and Bahrain teams belonging to Group H, the DPRK team won its rival team Philippines 0:0.
					
					 The DPRK team is to play the second game with Yemeni team in league matches on Oct. 13.

articles.title: Relics of Early Paleolithic Age Unearthed in DPRK
articles.content:
Relics of Early Paleolithic Age Unearthed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Archaeologists of Kim Il Sung University and the Academy of Social Sciences in the DPRK unearthed relics dating back to the early Paleolithic Age.
					 The relics were discovered in a fallen cave in Tongam-dong, Sunchon City, South Phyongan Province, which is located in the breast of a hill 40 meters high above the sea level.
					
					 They include 14 pieces of stone tools, 8 pieces of bone tools, 5,000 pieces of fossil mammal bones and 1,094 pieces of fossil spore and pollen. Typical of them are stone axe and fossil bone of Trogontherium cf. cuvier.
					
					 The Tongam-dong Relics are divided into the two cultural layers, which were ascertained to be formed about 880,000 years and 720,000 years ago.
					
					 The relics prove that mankind has inhabited in the territory of Korea from the early Paleolithic Age ago.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men Perform Undying Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men Perform Undying Feats for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- All Koreans are now waging a vigorous struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country while courageously meeting all challenges of the separatist forces at home and abroad.
					 All this would be unthinkable apart from the immortal leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un who provided great codes to be regarded as guidelines in achieving reunification and led the struggle for implementing them.
					
					 What occupies a particular place among their leadership exploits performed for national reunification is the President's undying feat as he advanced the most reasonable proposal for reunification and powerfully aroused all Koreans to put it into practice.
					
					 He laid down the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) at the historic Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on October 10, Juche 69 (1980) to pave the wide avenue to achieving the national reunification smoothly at the earliest possible date.
					
					 The proposal calls for reunifying the country by founding a Federal Republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideologies and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties.
					
					 The proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments advanced by Kim Il Sung is the most fair and aboveboard proposal as it reflects the nation's desire for reunification and specific conditions of the country most correctly.
					
					 It indicates the most reasonable way as it is conducive to defusing the constant danger of a war to the Korean Peninsula and ensuring global peace and security.
					
					 The proposal makes it possible for the Korean nation to more confidently conduct a movement for national reunification based on the clear-cut blueprint for reunification.
					
					 Voices admiring the proposal are heard from the north and the south and overseas and committees for supporting the proposal were inaugurated in different countries. This clearly proves the validity and vitality of the proposal.
					
					 Kim Il Sung also wisely led the struggle to materialize the proposal.
					
					 He paid a primary attention to providing prerequisites for founding the DFRK and made sure that climate for reunification was created through multi-channel dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 As a result, a chapter for nation-wide dialogue was opened in the 1990s, the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification formed and the inter-Korean high-level talks held, creating an environment favorable for achieving reunification by federal formula.
					
					 He made public a famous work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" in April, 1993 to provide a sure guarantee for building a reunified state, independent, peaceful and neutral, by federal formula through the great unity of the entire nation at an early date.
					
					 True to his last instructions for national reunification, leader Kim Jong Il powerfully aroused all Koreans to the struggle for realizing the proposal for reunification by federal formula. 
					
					 He made public the famous work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" in August, 1997, formulating the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and put forward it as an immortal banner for achieving independent reunification. 
					
					 He provided the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the Korean nation's history of the movement for national reunification, and made sure that the proposal for reunification by federal formula shed more brilliant rays as one for reunification common to the nation through the June 15 joint declaration. This is the distinguished exploit he performed in the history of the nation. 
					
					 He made the historic north-south declarations serve as great programmes for national reunification in the new century. Under his wise guidance contacts, dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south made brisk headway and the air and sea routes, railways and roads which had remained cut off for over half a century were rejoined, a dream-like reality. 
					
					 The cause of national reunification started and led by the great leaders is now greeting a new landmark phase thanks to the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Regarding the accomplishment of the historical cause of national reunification true to the noble intention of the great leaders as his sacred mission, Kim Jong Un is steering the movement of the nation for independent reunification. 
					
					 In his historic New Year Address this year he comprehensively clarified the ways for the north and the south to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification including the matter of settling the issue of national reunification in the common interests of the nation transcending the differences in ideology and social system and the matter of bringing about a great turn in the inter-Korean relations, as they had already agreed upon. 
					
					 Prompted by his iron-will to settle all the issues arising in the north-south relations in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, Kim Jong Un provided energetic leadership over the movement for national reunification. As a result, the service personnel and people of the DPRK could make positive efforts to open up the way for peace and reunification even under the grave situation which reached to the brink of war in August this year and finally possibility was created to put spurs to the development of the north-south relations. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas will surely build a reunified thriving nation on the land of Korea by working hard under the uplifted banner of immortal great programmes for reunification associated with outstanding wisdom and noble patriotism of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Il, Eternal General Secretary of WPK
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Il, Eternal General Secretary of WPK
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					On this occasion the Korean people recall the great feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il for the strengthening of the WPK.
					
					He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and set forth a programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism, thus providing the guiding idea and action program to be taken by a revolutionary party in the era of independence.
					
					He developed the President's idea of attaching importance to arms into the idea of Songun (military-first) revolution, theory of the Songun politics and advanced the theory of building a thriving socialist nation so that the WPK could lead the revolution and construction to victory.
					
					He advanced a unique policy of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism and energetically guided the work for its materialization, bringing about a radical turn in the party's organizational and ideological construction and leadership art.
					
					Under his energetic guidance, the WPK turned into an integral whole knitted together in ideological and organizational aspects and action and into a mother party faithfully serving the popular masses and a force guiding the Songun revolution.
					
					In praise of his undying feats for the party and the country and in reflection of the desire of the party members and all other people, the Fourth Conference of the WPK, convened in April Juche 101 (2012), adopted a decision on acclaiming leader Kim Jong Il as its eternal general secretary.
					
					The WPK shining with the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will lead the army and people in the DPRK only along the road of victory and glory under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un forever, displaying the dignity of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Leadership Feats for Party-building
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Leadership Feats for Party-building
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an editorial to the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The editorial says that his election under the unanimous will and desire of the entire party and army and all the people was a historic event of great significance in developing the WPK and carrying out the cause of Juche revolution.
					
					 This provided a firm guarantee for glorifying the WPK as the party of President Kim Il Sung and the revolutionary party of Juche-type, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The glorious path covered by the WPK is associated with the sacred history of the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il who remained most faithful to the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 The high prestige and invincible might of the WPK are linked with the august names of the great leaders. It has firmly adhered to its revolutionary character as the party of the leader for decades. This is the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Over half a century-long history of his leadership over party-building is shining as the undying history in which he brought about a fresh turn in building organization, ideology and leadership art of the party, remarkably increased the leadership role of the party in the revolution and construction and set a brilliant example in building the socialist ruling party.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding idea and leadership the WPK developed into the revolutionary party in which the ideological and leadership system of the leader was firmly established, a mother party serving the people by forming a harmonious whole with them and an invincible party with steel-strong discipline and militancy, demonstrating the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea all over the world.

articles.title: Socialism Led by WPK Is Invincible: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Socialism Led by WPK Is Invincible: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) over the revolution is the revolutionary leadership centered on the popular masses the basic mission of which is to protect their independence and fully implement it, and a peculiar revolutionary leadership characterized by the leadership of Songun revolution and the Songun revolutionary line, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Today the WPK is leading the cause of Juche revolution to victory with high authority and leadership ability as the great party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses was built on this land and great innovations and surges were made in the building of a thriving nation under the banner of Juche thanks to the leadership of the WPK which has solved all the problems in the revolution and construction on the principle of Juche and from an independent stand. 
					
					 Thanks to the WPK's leadership of the Songun revolution and Songun politics the militant power of the Korean People's Army has exceptionally grown stronger and the military position of the country has become an iron wall and the great unity of the service personnel and people has been achieved in the revolutionary soldier spirit. 
					
					 The WPK is the invincible revolutionary party which is leading the revolutionary cause of the leader to victory while holding the great leaders, founder and builder of our party, as eternal leader and eternal general secretary in high esteem and ensuring the unitary character of ideology and leadership century after century. 
					
					 The socialist cause advancing under the leadership of the WPK is invincible and steadfast is the faith of all the service personnel and people to accomplish the cause of Juche revolution pioneered on Mt. Paektu, following Marshal Kim Jong Un down through generations.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Ridicules Security Authorities' Cooked-up Evidence
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Ridicules Security Authorities' Cooked-up Evidence
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean security authorities produced ridiculous evidence in the course of trial of Pak Chang Suk, member of a civic body, held at the Suwon District Court on October 5 only to become a laughing stock of the attendants, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo. 
					 The evidence produced by investigators at the trial was all copies of legitimate articles posted on Thongil News, Newsis, etc. and they were posted on the individual homepage. 
					
					 The photos shown by them as evidence proving her meeting with members of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification were related to her private life. 
					
					 The paper said the human rights performance has been deteriorated under the present regime following the Lee Myung Bak regime, adding that the main reason for this is its suppression of freedom of thinking and expression and, consequently, south Korea will provoke derision of the world.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Implementation of Inter-Korean Agreement
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Implementation of Inter-Korean Agreement
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyonggi preparatory committee for the event common to the nation to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration held a press conference at the plaza of Suwon Railway Station on October 5 on the occasion of the 8th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Speakers at the conference slammed the present chief executive for paying only lip-service to unification and, in fact, fanning up confrontation and conflict in violation of points of the inter-Korean agreement.
					
					 They urged the authorities not to spark crisis but to implement the inter-Korean agreement, stop the acts of rattling the nerves of the other side such as leaflet scattering and ensure free NGO exchange.

articles.title: U.S. Denounced for Forcing Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Denounced for Forcing Deployment of THAAD in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on October 6 held a meeting in Seoul to denounce the U.S. for forcing south Korea to build alliance with Japan and allow the deployment of THAAD. 
					 Speakers recalled that the U.S. deputy secretary of State flew into Seoul to pressurize the south Korean authorities to improve the relations with Japan and deploy THAAD in south Korea. 
					
					 This is aimed at building tri-angular missile defense system and alliance of south Korea, U.S. and Japan, they said. 
					
					 They warned that if THAAD is deployed in south Korea, it will join in the U.S.-led missile defense system and turn into an advanced base of the U.S. for laying a siege to Northeast Asia. 
					
					 They demanded the south Korean authorities and the U.S. lift sanctions against the north and stop pressure upon it if they truly hope for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Members of the above-said body persistently waged protest actions, chanting slogans for peace against war when the U.S. deputy secretary of State was having confabs in the Foreign Ministry and the "government" building.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Marked in Peru
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Marked in Peru
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a national meeting in Lima, Peru on October 2 to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present at the meeting were personages of Peruvian political parties, organizations and institutions including the preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students, the National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, the Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Kim Jong Suk Library and the People's Women Union and other masses. 
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and secretary general of the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, said the WPK has led the struggle of the Korean people to victory and the key of which is the unity. 
					
					 Cati Campos Rontop, general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, expressed the belief that the WPK will as ever win victory after victory thoroughly preserving the principle of Juche and socialism under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, said the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by building and leading the party will be everlasting.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, a Malaysian company and Indonesian companies from October 1 to 3 on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The organizational secretary of the German Branch said that President Kim Il Sung accomplished the historic cause of founding a party right after the liberation of the country, adding:
					
					 The President made sure that the WPK successfully led the struggle of the Korean people for building a new country, winning the Fatherland Liberation War, carrying out post-war rehabilitation and construction and building socialism.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism, formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and advanced the revolution and construction.
					
					 The idea and cause of the great leaders have been successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will as ever further our solidarity activities to support the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed by Angolan Body
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed by Angolan Body
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) released a statement on Sept. 30.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The founding anniversary of the WPK which has developed into the most mighty and militant revolutionary party of the working class, overcoming all challenges and ordeals of history, is a holiday common to progressive mankind.
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and strengthened by HE Kim Jong Il has strikingly demonstrated its invincible might to the world, leading the socialist cause along the road of victory without any slightest deviation even when communists and workers' parties underwent the tragedy of division and collapse in various countries.
					
					 Now the WPK is growing stronger under the energetic leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un who is possessed of the same noble traits as the great leaders'.
					
					 We sincerely hope that the WPK would register bigger successes in its struggle for guiding the sacred cause of the Korean people to a victory.
					
					 We will further boost the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of Angola and the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by British Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by British Personage
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), praised the DPRK when interviewed by the British paper Guardian on Sept. 22.
					 Noting the government and people are single-mindedly united in the DPRK, he said supreme leader Kim Jong Un has been boundlessly revered and respected by the people as he has given priority to their intention and energetically led Korea.
					
					 Recalling that there often took place demonstrations in protest against the U.S. government and the south Korean fascist regime before their embassies in London recently, he ridiculed the south Korean regime as a puppet of the U.S.
					
					 It is a universally accepted thought in Britain that art is only for connoisseurs but in the DPRK even factories have their own art groups and every morning songs resound through streets, he noted, adding:
					
					 The West should learn from the DPRK how to become culturally civilized.
					
					 Socialism represents the future of mankind and the world will advance toward socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was published in booklet by the Angkor Publishing House of Cambodia. 
					 The work, which was brought to light on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), expounds the idea that the leadership of the party is a decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause, the matter of developing the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche type, the basic way for the Party to discharge its mission and duty as a leading political organization, etc.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on October 1. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK posted the work on the internet homepage of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association on September 28.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed in Hungary, Slovenia
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed in Hungary, Slovenia
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Hungarian and Slovenian preparatory committees for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea issued statements.
					 The Hungarian preparatory committee said in a statement on Oct. 1:
					
					 The 70-year history of the WPK was one of the proud victories associated with the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and one of the struggle for strengthening the unity and cohesion of the party in every way.
					
					 Today the WPK has been strengthened into the invincible and steel-strong party in which the party and masses have become a harmonious whole thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 No force can check the Korean people who are dynamically advancing to socialism, united close around the WPK.
					
					 The Slovenian preparatory committee said in its statement on Sept. 29 that the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il is now demonstrating only victories as it holds Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre nuevas viviendas de ciudad de Rason
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre nuevas viviendas de ciudad de Rason
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el barrio Paekhak de la zona de Songong de la ciudad de Rason transformado milagrosamente como aldea maravillosa, al cabo de haber corrido largo camino para ofrecer al pueblo amable hogares de felicidad con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					El Mariscal apreto uno tras uno las manos de los comandantes del EPC y los funcionarios y elogio los meritos de ellos quienes cumplieron la orden de acabar con la restauracion de la ciudad inundada de Rason antes del dia de fundacion del partido y anadio que vino aqui con alegria para recorrer antes que nada las viviendas construidas nuevamente.
					
					Recorriendolas, averiguo en detalles el estado de construccion y preparacion de mudanza.
					
					Estudio esmeradamente si nuevas viviendas son mejores que las anteriores, instalaron bien los hipocaustos y corre bien el agua potable y expreso gran satisfaccion de que construyeron todas las viviendas como excelentes hogares donde los habitantes puedan gozar a sus anchas de una vida feliz y civilizada.
					
					Es muy pintoresca nueva aldea erguida en el barrio Paekhak por el EPC, dijo y continuo que le gustan el tejado y el color de la pintura de pared exterior y realizaron bien la obra de las carreteras, los muros de contencion y desaguaderos. En particular, formaron los huertos y prepararon las lenas lo que se convirtio en una tradicion, agrego y mostro una gran satisfaccion.
					
					Se puso muy alegre al presenciar con amplia sonrisa las viviendas nuevas del barrio Paekhak que se parece como una obra de bellas artes y anadio que no habra otra cosa tan alegre ni un trabajo precioso como esto y que como daba enfasis siembre  los trabajos por el pueblo son importantisimas que otros.
					
					Mostro gran alegria diciendo que se levanto una nueva aldea maravillosa en el breve tiempo de mas de 30 dias y apunto con enfasis que esto es el milagro que puede crear solo nuestro Ejercito Popular que tiene la fidelidad al Partido y el ardiente amor al el pueblo y que se siente un orgullo de ser Comandante Supremo del EPC, defensor de la patria, creador de felicidad del pueblo y patrulla de la materializacion de las politicas del Partido.
					
					El Mariscal evaluo altamente las proezas de los constructores militares que defendieron la confianza preciosa del pueblo en el Partido y el prestigio del Partido al materializar cabalmente la orden del Partido y dio agradecimiento en nombre del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a todas las unidades participantes en la construccion.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que el mismo queria hacer alarde de los meritos de los militares del EPC mostrados en la region de Rason y que no podia partir sin fotografiarse con ellos y espero una hora y media hasta cuando se reunieran decenas de miles de los militares.
					
					Por eso, se extendio en la tierra de Rason un paisaje noble sin precedente en el mundo que los militares se fotografian de recuerdo en torno a su Comandante Supremo riendo y llorando por alegria, tomando como fondo las viviendas construidas por si mismos.
					
					Al Mariscal le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Yang Gon, O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won, Kim Yo Jong y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de felicitacion con motivo del 70o aniversario de fundacion de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de felicitacion con motivo del 70o aniversario de fundacion de PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigieran el dia 7 en nombre comun el Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El mensaje senala que la historia del PTC es la gran historia de las actividades revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien continuo con exito la idea y la causa del Presidente.
					
					Alaba que el Presidente es el fundador del glorioso PTC y el politico extraordinario y destacado lider del siglo XX quien  fortalecio el partido como orientador potente de la causa revolucionaria del Juche e hizo manifestar la dignidad como prestigioso partido revolucionario que dirige la causa de la independencia de la humanidad y la socialista.
					
					Las hazanas del Presidente quien fundo el partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano mediante la idea sobresaliente y practicas extraordinarias y adorno la historia de Corea de nuestra era con las victorias y glorias mas brillantes al dirigir el Estado Mayor de la Revolucion con la direccion adiestrada seran inmortales en la historia de la patria y de la lucha de las masas populares, aclara.
					
					Subraya que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il es el eterno Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea quien desarrollo el PTC como Partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung y poderosa fuerza orientadora de la revolucion del Songun, lo dirigio sabiamente a las sucesivas victorias y preparo la eterna base de la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					El Dirigente ligo la idea Juche creada por el Presidente con el nombre respetable del Presidente y la definio como unica idea directiva del Partido y la Revolucion y proclamo como maximo programa del partido la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo y dirigio sabiamente la causa historica por su realizacion, asevera.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien al heredar la idea del Presidente de dar importancia a los asuntos militares, dirigio sin cesar al Ejercito Popular de Corea y lo trasformo en el ejercito del Lider y el Partido, definio la politica de Songun como modo principal de la politica socialista y la materializo totalmente en todas las esferas de las actividades del Partido y el Estado, lo que deviene sus proezas especiales acumuladas en el cumplimiento de la causa de nuestro partido y la revolucion del Juche, apunta.
					
					El mensaje subraya que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un es el gran dirigente quien conduce con firmeza el PTC como potente organizacion politica directiva de la revolucion del Juche, en acato a la idea y la causa de los grandes Lideres.
					
					Como enaltecio en el puesto maximo al Mariscal quien materializa sin vacilacion las instrucciones de los grandes Lideres tomandolas como invariable conviccion y dirige la lucha revolucionaria y la construccion mediante su cualidad sobresaliente sin par y la direccion experta, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea se ha fortalecido y desarrollado cada vez mas como glorioso partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, senala.
					
					Concluye que sera siempre victoriosa la marcha heroica del PTC y el ejercito y el pueblo que avanzan enalteciendo al Mariscal en los puestos maximos del Partido y la Revolucion y enarbolando las banderas del Sol eterno de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y nos habra solo la eterna prosperidad y gloria.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Uganda
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 53o aniversario de la independencia de Uganda, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					En su mensaje, el remitente subrayo que esta complacido de que bajo la direccion correcta del mandatario el pueblo de Uganda logra gran avance en los esfuerzos por consolidar la estabilidad politica y la paz del pais y alcanzar el permanente desarrollo de la economia nacional.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que en el futuro tambien se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Uganda y deseo al destinatario los exitos en su trabajo responsable y al pueblo ugandes el nuevo desarrollo y prosperidad.

articles.title: RPDC decide establecer zona de desarrollo economico de Kyongwon
articles.content:
RPDC decide establecer zona de desarrollo economico de Kyongwon 
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio establecer la zona de desarrollo economico de Kyongwon en algunas partes de la comuna de Ryudasom del distrito de Kyongwon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte. 
					En esa zona se ejerce la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 8 un decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
